name: Marketing
description: Drives the creative vision of HooHacks through website design and engaging social media content. Lead outreach initiatives to grow HooHacks.

name: Technology
description: Oversees all technology for HooHacks, developing and implementing innovative solutions to enhance club operations.

name: Finance
description: Manages over $100,000 in corporate sponsorships and allocates funds for various HooHacks initiatives.

description: Plans the hackathon and other HooHacks events by coordinating with both student-run and professional organizations, managing schedules, food, and prizes. Oversees every detail to ensure the best possible experience for our hackers.

name: Internal
description: Plans and coordinates social events for the entire board, fostering engagement, collaboration, and a sense of community.
